prop.Prop Class Reference

Props are background objects that have no influence on gameplay aside from simply looking pretty. More...

Detailed Description

Props are background objects that have no influence on gameplay aside from simply looking pretty.

Member Function Documentation

def prop.Prop.draw (   self,
  screen,
  camera,
  scale = 1 
)

Draw the prop.

This is called by the game's Map instance before any other objects are drawn.

def prop.Prop.getBounds (   self  ) 

Return the bounding box for the prop.

Required for props to be insertable into QuadTree instances.
